top_comments.comment: So many good DIY projects 👏♥ I really liked the mason jars and napkins holder!

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Such cute projects!! My favorites are definitely the french horn swag and the book stack. Absolutely beautiful!!
TFS!!! 🎅🌲⛄💕

Just what I needed for my tiered tray💗. I hope one of my Dollar Trees will get the wood trucks and ice skates I have seen.  
I am obsessed with the trees!!!! Cute snow globe💗
Good projects. Will try the sweater jars. Thanks for sharing.
i adore your videos, especially christmas videos as christmas is my favourite time of year (also because my birthday is 5 days after christmas day)
